name: Tanky Tank game 2D
description:
💣 Tanky is a 2D tank game with awesome 2D graphics. You will fight against challenging tanks, turrets and bosses. Luckily there are different pickups on the way to help you. It makes your tank faster, boosts your health or adds more ammunition to annihilate your enemies.

This 2D tank game will literally blow your mind. It is meant to give you a retro feeling. You'll get in conflict with machine gun turrets, tanks and pick-ups. Beware, something big is lurking at you... Oh and don't forget, the more downloads and reviews, the more levels will be added for free.

Features:

💥 DESTROY! - Destroy enemies with the force of your 65mm canon

💪 UPGRADE! - Move faster or armour up!

🗺️ ADVENTURE! - Roll out your tank and collect war loot!

😈 BEAT THE BIG BOSS - Somewhere there is a big boss for you to defeat.

🕹️ 2D RETRO STYLE - simple and clear graphics that works well in 2d.

🥊 FIGHT YOUR WAY TO THE END - you need to conquer the level to progress.

What can you expect?

- Crazy tank battle game

- 2D retro graphics

- 5 intense battle scenarios

- Pickups and power-ups

- Various enemies to conquer

- A lot of fun with your gun

- Completely free and NO advertising

What are you waiting for? Engage your enemies at once, soldier. 🎖️
